subject: Computers and the Internet
Computer Security
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: As more fans are drawn to the Web for major sporting events, such as the N.C.A.A. men's basketball tournament which continues Thursday, so too are hackers with less sporting motives.
snippet: As more fans are drawn to the Web for major sporting events, such as the N.C.A.A. men's basketball tournament which continues Thursday, so too are hackers with less sporting motives.
